effects.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target and a separate $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effects.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.

moveDescription:
The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also
make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.
